Key Match Events: The Texas Rangers hammered the Arizona Diamondbacks in Game 4 of the World Series, 11-7
Marcus Semien, Corey Seager and Jonah Heim each homered on the night and Semien finished with five RBI
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Rangers continue to absolutely rake, with their sixth postseason game scoring seven or more runs
The Diamondbacks will now have their three starters the've utilized throughout the postseason—Zac Gallen, Merrill Kelly and Brandon Pfaadt—available for the next three games
Others: The Rangers will be without starting pitcher Max Scherzer and Adolis García for the rest of the World Series
The D-Backs deserve some credit for not folding, putting up seven runs in total after facing an early 10-0 deficit
